ref: 8937 *prātihāriya -- , prātihārya -- n. ʻ juggling ʼ Lalit. [prati- hārya -- n. R., Pk. paḍihāriya -- n. -- pratihāra -- ]
Pa. pāṭihāriya -- , ˚hīra -- n. ʻ wonder, miracle ʼ;
Pk. pāḍihāriya -- n. ʻ magic for getting things back ʼ, ˚hēra -- n. ʻ a partic. kind of worship ʼ;
Si. peḷahara, ˚hära ʻ miracle, religious procession ʼ.
